reviewText: I've had hip, neck, shoulder pain for so long.  This past year I've gone to massage therapists, acupuncturists, etc.  The DVD is absolutely fantastic and has helped me more than everything else I've tried. Very simple stretches.  Really Great!  All to do with the psoas.  I've tried other exercises and stretches for the psoas, but his really work!
A little too repetitive.  Could have done both videos in one
Good program, some exercises were helpful. I appreciated the short exercise sets. Directions were thorough and clear; helpful for rehab overall.
